channel.title: Problem-Solving on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Problem-Solving on stultus notes

item.title: Deductive Reasoning - Eliminate the Impossible
item.description: When you have eliminated the impossible, whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.

item.title: Inversion
item.description: Looking at a problem or decision from the opposite point of view to avoid failure rather than achieve success.
